title: What can you do if the sheriff is unable to serve bench warrant because debtor avoids service?
question: Debtor did not show up for debtors examination twice. Second time he avoided service of debtor exam notice and subpoena. Judge issued bench warrant and the sheriff wasn't able to serve him with that because he avoided service.
answers:
You may want to hire a private process server. If you pay them enough they can hide out all day, Sheriffs just can't do that.

Rob

You may hire process server or private investigator to investigate debtor habits and attempt service where debtor lives, works, plays. provide as much information as possible to process server or private investigator to assist them in efforts to locate and serve debtor.
Get a private detective to find out where the debtor works and the hours the debtor normally keeps at home and at work, then provide this info to the sheriff's office.
